attributes.action: Should there be an English parliament?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: grant semi-independence to the English people via a devolved parliament. the Scots and Welsh have one so why shouldn't we do, as we are the majority in the UK and comprise 80% of the population. we should be allowed to govern ourselves, free from interference from Scotland and Wales, within the framework of Britain

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
